column1: Baby Barnaby's////My husband and I could not decide what to rate Baby Barnaby's
column2: I was going to say 4 stars
column3: he wanted 5. Â The only reason I wanted to give it a 4 was the coffee was weak and watery
column5: because the breakfast was so phenomenal we decided to go with 5. The pancakes were amazing. The potatoes were perfect and my biscuits were delicious! Can't wait to go back!
